channel.description: Recent content in Release Notes - 2020 on Releases - aspose.com

item.title: Aspose.HTML for Java 20.12 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.HTML for Java 20.12 Major Features We are honored to announce the December release of Aspose.HTML for Java. We have done a lot to stabilize the product. The stability has been improved processing CSS, SVG, Markdown, Fonts, bidi text rendering, and table. We also made stabilization when working with licenses.

item.title: Aspose.HTML for Java 20.9.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.HTML for Java 20.9.1 Major Features As per the regular monthly update process of all APIs being offered by Aspose, we are honored to announce the September release of Aspose.HTML for Java. Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category HTMLNET-2267 HTM to Image: line break issue Bug - Fixed license Bug

item.title: Aspose.HTML for Java 20.8 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.HTML for Java 20.8. Major Features As per the regular monthly update process of all APIs being offered by Aspose, we are honored to announce the August release of Aspose.HTML for Java. In this release we have: Improved the text splitting algorithm for tables rendering Appended shared facade for most often conversion scenarios Improvements and Changes Key Summary Category HTMLJAVA-425 HTML to PDF – logo from the top is moved to the bottom after conversion Bug HTMLJAVA-426 HTML to PDF – Data inside the table goes beyond the column width Bug

item.title: Aspose.HTML for Java 20.6 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.HTML for Java 20.6. Major Features As per the regular monthly update process of all APIs being offered by Aspose, we are honored to announce the June release of Aspose.HTML for Java. In this release we have made the number of improvements, related to the PDF and MHT formats: rendering missing tables; fixed application hangs; improved formatting for text blocks. The following is a list of issues covering all changes in this release of Aspose.
